page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: Most people in this area live in a tr- aditional family unit, having on aver- age two children, who are educated lo- caly. Fathers are the main bread winn- ers, although it is now common for ma- ny mothers to have part or full time jobs, as well as running the home.The government pay social secuity to one parent families, the unemployed & the old age pensioners. Also a family all- owance is paid.At weekends, family ti- me will be spent in domestic chores & general activites. Many people own a dog for company and security,and a cat children keep guinea pigs, rabbits, and in this area there is a high prop- ortion of horses per capita. Annual holidays are spent either abroard or in this country. Active holidays are becoming very popular.
